## My Services & Expertise

::: {.panel-tabset}

### üß† Human Factors & Usability Evaluation
**Do you need to know whether your product, interface, or procedure will work for people *in practice*‚Äîand where errors, friction, or confusion are coming from?**

I run human factors evaluations that map real user goals onto real task demands. This includes identifying failure points (where users misinterpret cues, choose the wrong action, or miss critical information), and turning those findings into **concrete design changes**.

#### Services
* **Task & workflow analysis:** Decompose tasks, decision points, and handoffs; identify cognitive load and bottlenecks.
* **Usability testing:** Plan and run studies; define success metrics; capture qualitative + behavioral measures.
* **Error analysis & risk-oriented evaluation:** Identify likely error pathways and mitigation strategies (interface, procedure, training).
* **Human-centered requirements & design guidance:** Translate findings into implementable requirements and prioritized recommendations.
* **Evaluation reporting for stakeholders:** Concise, decision-ready outputs for product, engineering, and leadership.

---

### ü•Ω VR & Simulation for Human Performance
**Do you want to test an interface, workflow, or training approach in conditions that are closer to real life‚Äîbefore you roll it out?**

As a cognitive experimental psychologist, I have harnessed VR simulations to create **high-control, high-realism** testbeds‚Äîideal for investigating human factors questions where field testing would be expensive or dangerous.

#### Services
* **Simulation-based prototyping:** Build VR scenarios that reflect real-world tasks, constraints, and environmental demands.
* **Human factors evaluation in VR:** Measure human performance, errors, attention, workload, and adaptation across conditions.
* **Technology & sensor integration:** Synchronise events in VR with data streams (e.g., ECG/EEG/EDA, eye-tracking, motion capture).
* **Presence & experiential realism (when it matters):** Audit and optimise factors that influence user engagement, behavior, and transfer.
* **Bespoke VR development:** From simple environments to interactive simulations tailored to your evaluation goals.

---

### üìä Measurement, Experimental Design & Data Analysis
**Do you have complex data but need trustworthy answers‚Äîor do you need a study designed so the results actually generalize?**

I build **reproducible analytic pipelines** and design studies that support clear conclusions. This is especially useful when your data are messy, multi-modal, or high-frequency (e.g., VR telemetry, biosignal feedback).

#### Services
* **Study design for strong inference:** Hypotheses, operational definitions, sampling, power/sensitivity, and analysis plans.
* **Statistical modeling:** Mixed models, GAMs, Bayesian hierarchical models, and (when appropriate) machine learning‚Äîaligned to the question.
* **Physiological signal processing:** Cleaning, artifact handling, feature extraction, and interpretation for physiological (e.g., ECG/EDA/EEG) data streams.
* **Reproducible reporting:** Automated, transparent workflows that produce publication- and stakeholder-ready reports.
* **Visualization & dashboards:** Aesthetically pleasant publication-ready figures and interactive dashboards that clearly portray the story of your findings.

:::
